title: History Entry Template
description: Records a single historical event as a summary with date, title, category, and cross-file updates. History entries should be summaries, not detailed accounts. 10 minutes of brainstorming produces a wealth of material.
source_chapter: V2 Ch10 -- Creating Time and History

category.description: Event category -- provides a checklist for brainstorming

entities_involved.description: Gods, species, powers, figures, items involved

present_day_impact.description: How this event affects the present

known_to_characters.description: Whether current characters know about this

cross_file_updates.description: Which other files need updating because of this event (sovereign power, item, creature, land feature files)

war_reasons.description: If a war: resources, territory, ethnic cleansing, pride, or legacy grievances

x-cross-references.world-history-timeline: This entry belongs on the World History Timeline
x-cross-references.world-figure-profile: May create or involve world figures
